CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The devices are structured as As shown in Figure 5a and Table 3 , the device that blended PQCDTB and PC61BM in a 1 : 1 ratio had an open - circuit voltage ( V OC ) of 0.76 V , a short - circuit current ( J SC ) of 4.4 mA cm^-2 , a fill factor ( FF ) of 47.5% and a power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) of 1.6% .

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PQCDTB |
| PC61BM |

In the given paragraph, the two material names mentioned are "PQCDTB" and "PC61BM". These are the materials that were blended in a 1:1 ratio in the device.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PQCDTB |
| PC61BM |

In the given paragraph, the two material names mentioned are "PQCDTB" and "PC61BM". These are the only two valid entities that can be classified as "Material Name" as they are the materials used in the device. The other terms such as "1:1 ratio", "open-circuit voltage", "short-circuit current", "fill factor", and "power conversion efficiency" are not material names and have been excluded from the table.
